import Link from "next/link"; import { userActions } from "../actions"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; const NewUserModal = ({children, pageProps, logout}) => { const router = useRouter() const onLogoutClick = (event) => { event.preventDefault() logout() } return
×

New User

} const mapDispatchToProps = { logout: userActions.logout }; export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(NewUserModal)
